item.title: JLL reports that tech startups are a significant driver of real estate demand in the APAC region
item.description:
New types of office users are emerging in the form of startups, with more tech companies exploring unconventional spaces such as coworking facilities and industrial properties, according to JLL, a real estate and investment management firm. The technology sector in the Asia Pacific region has experienced significant growth, driven by mobile technology, e-commerce, and the rise of fintech. This growth has fueled demand for both traditional office spaces and business parks...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/jll-reports-that-tech-startups-are-a-significant-driver-of-real-estate-demand-in-the-apac-region/

item.title: The demand for jobs in Singapore is being driven by digitization, according to Robert Walters
item.description:
Source: Robert Walters. Click on the image to view a larger version. According to the international recruitment firm Robert Walters, the increasing presence of digital technology was the main driver of recruitment in Singapore during the second quarter of 2015. These insights were published in the companyâ€™s Asia Job Index for Q2 2015. Toby Fowlston, Managing Director of Robert Walters Southeast Asia, acknowledged the anticipated decrease in job advertisements during this quarter...

item.title: Top-paying technology jobs for 2014 - for those in the United States
item.description:
The 2014 Salary Guides published by Robert Half Technology and The Creative Group identify six technology and digital jobs experiencing high demand in the US. This demand may also be reflected in the Asia Pacific region. Companies are specifically seeking professionals skilled in information and network security, data analysis for business intelligence, and mobile development. “Building a strong online presence and engaging customers through mobile platforms is crucial for businesses today,” says John Reed, Senior Executive Director of Robert Half Technology and The Creative Group...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/top-paying-technology-jobs-for-2014-for-those-in-the-united-states/
